meanings.definition: Lasting or extending over multiple years.
meanings.sent1: The multiyear project finally came to an end after five long years.
meanings.sent2: The company's multiyear plan helped them achieve long-term success.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a challenge to plan a multiyear vacation, but we managed to do it!
meanings.sent4: The multiyear drought left the land barren and dry, like a desert.
meanings.sent5: The multiyear commitment to exercise led to significant improvements in health.

meanings.definition: Involving or covering a period of more than one year.
meanings.sent1: The multiyear lease agreement provided stability for the tenants.
meanings.sent2: The multiyear warranty ensured the product would be covered for an extended period.
meanings.sent3: The multiyear birthday celebration was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: The multiyear journey to success was filled with ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The multiyear renovation project transformed the old building into a modern space.
